name: Dragon's Lair II: Escape from Singe's Castle
overview: Just a short time ago Dirk the Daring rescued the beautiful princess Daphne and returned her to King Aeithelred her father. The Kingdom rejoiced at the return of their princess and the peace the has been secured for the kingdom. Dirk being made of sterner stuff decides to return to the dragon's lair to seek his fortune from the Lizard King's domain which lies deep within the castles depths. It is rumoured that a pot of gold coins is there for the taking that will give wealth beyond dreams. However there are drawbacks, the Lizard King does not take kindly to visitors entering his domain and has enchanted the pot of gold with a magic spell. If Dirk does manage to collect the gold he will have to face many perils before encountering the mud monsters. Defeat them and freedom and the hand of fair Daphne will be his.
